Name: Badge - Xeno Mimic
Description: After obtaining, you can enter the Personal Space > Badge editing interface to set up the badge wall.
Description2:
"Data sync complete. Mimetic Core linked."
A mysterious armor from an uncharted astral realm. Its surface, woven from bioadaptive metal, reshapes itself, becoming a second heart to its wearer. In this moment, you become the will of a star, igniting the light that turns fate on its head.
